And so, our relationship was exposed \. .......

This matter was immediately informed to my parents, and
within the day, my father and mother came to pick me up.

In the car on the way home, neither of my parents said a
word, \. and I ended up feeling uncomfortable even at home
.......

......At that time, \. if \C[14]I had been
careful\C[0].......
